library(teal.modules.general)

app <- teal::init(
  data = teal.data::teal_data(IRIS = iris, MTCARS = mtcars),
  modules = teal::modules(
    label = "Data Exploration",
    teal::modules(
      label = "Tables",
      tm_data_table("IRIS Table", dataname = "IRIS"),
      tm_data_table("MTCARS Table", dataname = "MTCARS")
    ),
    teal::modules(
      label = "Visualizations",
      teal.modules.general::tm_g_scatterplot("Scatter", dataname = "IRIS", ...),
      teal.modules.general::tm_g_distribution("Distribution", dataname = "IRIS", ...)
    )
  )
)
